actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-477, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2039 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI are waived. At the conclusion of debate, no further consideration of the bill shall be in order except pursuant to a subsequent order of the House.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 117.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 263 - 146 (Roll No. 71).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2039) to authorize appropriations for the Legal Services Corporation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2039 (authorizing appropriations for the Legal Services Corporation).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2039) to authorize appropriations for the Legal Services Corporation, and for other purposes.
